about_the_game:
This is the Travelling Mouse's Guide to the Kingdom of Rodentia, an illustrated digital companion book to Small Saga!

With over 20 pages of content, this guide includes:

  • An exploration of key places you'll visit in the game. Learn about the pristine Royal Palace of Murida, the underground arts scene of Sky Garden, and the violent delights of Vinium's Circus Minimus.
  • An overview on modes of transportation and local lingo. Make sure you walk the walk and talk the talk!
  • An explanation of how to properly follow Rodentian customs. When is it acceptable for a mouse to pay tribute? How should one follow the Old Way? And what's the deal with all the statues?
  • The world of Rodentia brought to life through four beautiful watercolour-styled illustrations by Ash S.

Note: this guide is an external pdf file. You can find it through the Steam library by right-clicking Small Saga > Manage > Browse local files.
